articles.title: Elgar confident novice Dewald Brevis can adapt to Pro cricket
articles.description: Proteas Test captain Dean Elgar said he's looking forward to seeing Titans batting tyro Dewald Brevis making the step up to professional cricket.
articles.content:
• Proteas Test captain Dean Elgar said he's excited to see Dewald Brevis making the step up to the professional level.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Australian cricket great Rod Marsh in hospital after suffering heart attack
articles.description: Australian cricket icon Rod Marsh has suffered a major heart attack and is recovering in a Queensland hospital.
articles.content:
Australian cricket legend Rod Marsh is in a Queensland hospital after suffering a serious heart attack.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
